net.jforum.dao

Interface PostDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericPostDAO, HsqldbPostDAO, OraclePostDAO, SqlServer2000PostDAO, SqlServerPostDAO

    public interface PostDAO
    Model interface for Post. This interface defines methods which are expected to be implementd by a specific data access driver. The intention is to provide all functionality needed to update, insert, delete and select some specific data.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

      • selectAllByTopicByLimit

        List selectAllByTopicByLimit(int topicId,
                           int startFrom,
                           int count)
        Selects all messages relacted to a specific topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topic ID
        startFrom - The count position to start fetching
        count - The total number of records to retrieve
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all records found. Each entry of the ArrayList is a Post object
